definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Musole's findings were shared with various Zambian government ministries.
sentences.chinese: 穆索莱将调查结果向赞比亚有关各部做了通报。

sentences.english: Looking into your faces I see the face of Zambia.
sentences.chinese: 观看你们的表情，我看到赞比亚的形象。

sentences.english: Chinese-owned enterprises have pumped money into Zambia's mining sector in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，中资企业一直在向赞比亚的采矿业注资。

sentences.english: For China, events in Zambia should be a warning sign.
sentences.chinese: 对中国来说，赞比亚发生的事情应该是一个警讯。

sentences.english: The group with Zambian children were used halothane anesthesia(HLT group).
sentences.chinese: 另一组为赞比亚儿童，选用氟烷麻醉，为HLT组。

sentences.english: We have some joint efforts with the Gates Foundation in Zambia.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在同盖茨基金会在赞比亚开展合作。

sentences.english: As many as 10,000 fled north to Zambia.
sentences.chinese: 有多达一万人向北逃到了赞比亚。

sentences.english: I see the future of Zambia.
The turmoil at the Chambishi mine quickly bled into Zambian politics.
sentences.chinese: 昌比希铜矿的骚乱很快蔓延至赞比亚政界。

sentences.english: The brothers have also hired a Zambian human resources officer, Corry Moono.
sentences.chinese: 兄弟们还雇佣了赞比亚人力资源主任，科里穆诺。

sentences.english: Zambia, which had no such official policy, was heavily afflicted by poaching.
sentences.chinese: 没有此类官方政策的赞比亚则深受盗猎行为的折磨。

sentences.english: The point of entry into Zambia would be the Chirundu border post.
sentences.chinese: 想要进入赞比亚应该经由奇龙杜边防哨所。

sentences.english: They have invested in biofuel crops in Zambia and the Congo.
sentences.chinese: 他们在赞比亚和刚果投资生产生物燃料作物。

sentences.english: CNMC made its first investment in Zambia in 1998.
sentences.chinese: 中国有色集团于1998年在赞比亚做出第一笔投资。

sentences.english: Kafue lechwe horns on the dried out plains in Zambia.
sentences.chinese: 赞比亚干旱平原上的喀辅拉河驴羚羊角。

sentences.english: Or there’s the example of the Zambian copper mines.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个赞比亚铜矿的事例。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
